Problem resolution
BridgeValley Community and Technical College South Charleston, WV Medical Assisting - certification 2008
Ben Franklin Career Center Dunbar, WV

Was thorough and professional in my responses to all customer inquiries. Worked with computerized and automated systems for forecasting sales, SWAT, P&L. Actively sought out opportunities for personal growth and development. Handled all customer complaints professionally, putting customer satisfaction first. Sourced and interviewed candidates for team members to assess their suitability and readiness for the position. Was in charge of answering customer questions about merchandise and pricing. Maintained a calm demeanor throughout periods of high volume or unusual events in order to keep the store running smoothly and set a good example for the shift team. Suggested alternatives when a product was out of stock. Professional Summary

Oversaw the quality assurance program, which included on-site assessments, internal audits, and clients work Answered [70 plus] calls per [12 hours] to help customers with their questions and concerns. Devised individual treatment plans based on the patient's medical history and diagnosis. Took urine samples in order to test for drug use.

Facilitated group and individual therapy in an outpatient setting. Provided counseling and support to clients who were abusing drugs or alcohol. Developed team communications and information for meetings. Oversaw intakes and assessments that were family-centered, strengths-based, culturally competent, and individualized.
Prestera Center Kanawha County Charleston, WV
Routed incoming calls to the most qualified personnel and departments within the company. Client drug screens

Was in charge of sorting and distributing mail correspondence between departments and personnel, as well as parcel packaging, preparation, and timely shipping. Monitored the premises, screened visitors, updated logs, and issued passes to maintain security. Answered phone calls from clients, vendors, and a variety of other callers looking for information. Greeted all customers with a friendly greeting, answered general questions, gathered information about the nature of their visit, and directed them to the appropriate offices. Wrote professional memos, letters, and marketing copy to support business objectives and growth. Kept track of visitors and screened them to ensure that they had access to inter-office personnel. Kept the reception area clean and tidy to give visitors a positive first impression.
